reviewText: Great DVD for kids
Great!
My children love this DVD. They watch it all the time. Adorable. Pure. My children  have loved this one the best out if all the BOZ dvd's.
Bought as a gift I can't tell you how much Boz the Bear has been played at my house. the kids love it. I'm surprised it didn't wear out yet.
My kids love this Christmas movie and it was a fun gift for them.  Product is as described and arrived within the projected time frame.  We are very happy with this purchase.

This movie is a hit with our entire family.
My 2 1/2 year old grandson loves this and I love the good, Christian values the Boz videos teach.
The grand kids love watching this fun, well animated film.

I got this dvd for my grand daughter.  She loves it!!!  She has several of the Boz dvd's.  My daughter is very careful
about what her kids watch and the Boz dvd's all meet her standards.  They teach great character traits and morals
and they are well done.
My kids love BOZ and I was so excited to find a Christmas themed Boz to accentuate our Christmas season. I love the message and my children watch it over and over.
Love boz!!! My son started watching him at 2 he is now 5 and still loves boz!!!! Perfect for entertaining children and most importantly it teach about God!!!!!!!!!
Love this video...my four year old GD would watch all day. Age appropriate, good values exemplified, faith based.
I love Boz videos the Christmas epsiode is good too. My children ask to watch all year around lol.

This is PERFECT for any toddler wanting to know more about Christmas and leave out all the Santa crap. I love Boz in general and so do my kids. It's great in that, it's very clear in it's message about God and His role in our lives but it's not so in your face that it's intrusive. The Christmas DVD is longer than the other Boz DVDs but doesn't disappoint. It's so nice to have a clear gospel message delivered in an easy to understand, fun way for my kids. I've also purchased several to give as gifts to family and friends over the years.
Purchased as Christmas gift for gran child. Arrived on time...works fine
